title.rendered: 14 Things to do in West Hollywood

content.rendered:
West Hollywood, or WeHo as it’s known by locals, is one of the most unique neighborhoods in Los Angeles. It has vibrant nightlife and is home to the famous Sunset Strip. This neighborhood attracts everyone from celebrities to young professionals, and there’s so much on offer, you will never run out of things to do in West Hollywood. If you are planning to move to this iconic neighborhood, then you can use this guide to find exciting things to do and amazing places to visit in West Hollywood!

Related: Is moving to Los Angeles for you? Making the big move

Must Do Outdoor Activities in West Hollywood

1. Visit the Sunset Strip

If you’re a fan of Hollywood glamor, then the Sunset Strip is the spot for you. This iconic street is a West Hollywood attraction that is lined with top-tier luxury hotels, celebrity hot spots, and restaurants to satisfy any kind of palette. The hottest clubs and bars are located along this stretch, so be sure to check out some of these spots if you find yourself here on a Friday night!

Website

Go for shopping at the Beverly Center

Shopping at the Beverly Center is one of the most popular things to do in West Hollywood. Here, you’ll find over 200 shops, including Macy’s, Dolce & Gabbana, Tiffany & Co., and Louis Vuitton. There’s also a great selection of eateries for you to choose from, to give you the energy you need to get around them all!

Website

Enjoy the scenic beauty at Hollywood Reservoir

On the edge of Hollywood, hidden in the hills, is a beautiful body of water that few know exists. The Hollywood Reservoir is a West Hollywood attraction that was built in 1924 to provide water for Los Angeles and is still in use today. It’s also a great place to swim, fish, or have a picnic! It’s known as one of the best places to visit in West Hollywood for joggers and bikers as well!

Know More

Sports in West Hollywood

Attend the WeHo Sports Festival

The WeHo Sports Festival was created to focus on the participation of the LGBT community in sports throughout Los Angeles. This event is open to everyone and encourages people from all walks of life to come together and celebrate who they are whilst also getting some exercise. This is also an attempt to promote a healthy lifestyle among the participants and is one of the healthiest things to do in West Hollywood.

Website

Attend a baseball game at Dodger Stadium

If you’re a baseball fan, you will know what it feels like to be captivated by the crack of the bat and the roar of the crowd when your team hits a home run. Now, imagine this experience at one of the cathedrals of Major League Baseball and a well-known West Hollywood attraction. Attending a home match at Dodger Stadium is one of the best things do to in West Hollywood whether you’re familiar with the game or not.

Website

Museums in West Hollywood

Visit Los Angeles County Museum Of Art

Visiting LACMA is one of the best things to do in West Hollywood for both locals and visitors. From the thousands of paintings it houses to its beautiful botanical gardens, there’s something here for everyone. It has one of the most impressive collections of modern art in the world, spanning from Impressionism to Post Modernism. Take a break from the hustle and bustle of everyday life and explore all that this attraction has to offer!

Website

Visit Madame Tussauds, Hollywood

If you are looking for things to do in West Hollywood, then you cannot miss out on visiting Madame Tussauds. It features over 250 lifelike figures of celebrity icons in one amazing installation. This unique West Hollywood attraction is an exciting adventure that appeals to all generations. From Marilyn Monroe and Elvis Presley to Jennifer Lopez, Kim Kardashian, and many others, it’s a must-see for A-list enthusiasts!

Website

Visit the La Brea Tar Pits and Museum

The La Brea Tar Pits and Museum is one of the best places to visit in West Hollywood for anyone interested in the natural sciences, as it is one of the most important paleontological sites in North America. In the museum, you will find rare skeletons and Ice Age fossils dug up from the tar pits.

Website

Culture in West Hollywood

Visit the Hollywood Walk of Fame

The Hollywood Walk of Fame is a famous tourist attraction that stretches between Gower and La Brea Streets. The Walk of Fame features more than 2,600 stars embedded in the sidewalks. The stars are permanent public monuments to achievement in the entertainment industry, bearing the names of a mix of actors, musicians, directors, producers, musical and theatrical groups, fictional characters, and more.

Website

Enjoy a night at Comedy Store

So many great comedians live and work in LA, so attending a comedy gig is definitely one of the most entertaining things to do in West Hollywood. If you’re looking for a fun night out and a belly full of laughs, there’s no better place than Comedy Store in West Hollywood! And with tickets on offer at such affordable prices, you can catch a live stand-up show or improv comedy every night of the week.

Website

Explore restaurants in West Hollywood

WeHo Bistro

The WeHo Bistro is a popular hangout for both locals and tourists. This quaint cafe is decorated with rich, warm colors and features high ceilings that give the space an airy feel. WeHo Bistro is a hip bistro with outdoor seating and is one of the best places to visit in the city Hollywood for crêpes, quiches, and French-style sandwiches.

Website

Granville

Designers at Granville created a unique concept for their restaurant located in West Hollywood, CA. In an effort to provide customers with the best possible culinary experience, they introduced a menu that features international dishes as well as craft beers and cocktails.

Website

Explore bars in West Hollywood

Juniper

Juniper Lounge is one of the most exclusive and private cocktail lounges in Los Angeles. The atmosphere is clean and inviting. You and your friends will have a great time drinking and partying here.

Website

St Felix

St Felix Bar is one of the best places to visit in West Hollywood. It is a restaurant/bar that has great food, ambience, and music. It’s the perfect place to spend an evening with friends and loved ones.

Website
